answerText: Abraham-Lorentz Force [Also Accept: Radiation Reaction Force. Do not accept or Prompt on Lorentz Force as it is a distinct force][10] The Abraham-Lorentz force is proportional to charge squared times this quantity. This is the time derivative of the acceleration of a system.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 01 | 9 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This force's equation is derived, by integrating the power radiated due to the Larmor formula over time [10] Name this force acting on an accelerating charged particle due to its emission of electromagnetic radiation. A quantum analogue exists and is named for Dirac and Langevin in addition to the two named here.
